## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 30,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | To cover forecasted demand with a margin of error, taking into account the lead time and current stock level.  Multiple vendor order quantities can be used to reach the target. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 10,000 units lower than the player's planned order. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.5 days (based on current stock and recommended order) |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 6 days (based on forecasted demand and recommended order) |
| Comments                          | Ordering 30,000 units allows for sufficient coverage of the forecasted demand, considering potential variability, while keeping stock turnover healthy.  |
